Class ColorHistoryPanel

                                +--oaidtb.gui.ColorHistoryPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ColorHistoryPanel
extends javax.swing.colorchooser.AbstractColorChooserPanel

Un panel que se añade al JColorChooser para permitir al usuario reelegir entre los colores de los que ya existen instancias en un conjunto de datos "Point2dInstances".

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
See Also:

updateChooser

public void updateChooser()
Invoked automatically when the model's state changes. It is also called by installChooserPanel to allow you to set up the initial state of your m_ColorChooser. Override this method to update your ChooserPanel.
Overrides:
updateChooser in class javax.swing.colorchooser.AbstractColorChooserPanel
